description: National Defence has a requirement for Strapping at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Notice**

**Reference Number:** CB-4935-45760668
**Contracting Entity:** National Defence
**Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

**Request for Proposal (RFP): Strapping (N5340-12-3172016)**

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of strapping items, as detailed below. The delivery of the items will be requested at two locations: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Procurement Details:**

* Items: Strapping (N5340-12-3172016)
* Part Numbers: 102, GC000000101001 (KLEIN, GUENTHER INDUSTRIEBEDARF GMBH)
* Quantities: 
	+ 950 units for CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
	+ 150 units for CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Unit of Issue: RL (Rolled Goods)

Bidders must propose prices in Canadian dollars and indicate their brand name and model, and/or Part Number and National Company Identification Code (NCAGE) for equivalent or substitute products.

**Language and Documents:**

The tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Trade Agreement:**

This procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.

**Tendering Method:**

The tendering method is competitive, open bidding.

**Contract Start Date and End Date:**

No start and end dates are indicated.

**Contact Information:**

Christopher Cauchi
christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
Ph.: (555) 555-5555
For bid package and inquiries, please reference the notice URL.

**Attachments:**

Please find attached relevant bid packages and amendments:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4935/w8482-229447---rfp---en_0.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4935/w8482-229477---amendment-003.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4935/w848
